div.p: Interview Guides. The interview guides used in the human-centered design process. Three interview guides are included; the interview guide used for leadership interviews, the interview guide for attending physician interviews for the first round of interviews, and the interview guide used during the iterative improvement process. (DOCX 32 kb)
Pre- and Post Surveys. The complete pre- and post-surveys used in this study. The surveys were administered online. (DOCX 62 kb)
Supplemental Tables and Figures. The supplemental tables and figures references throughout the paper. (DOCX 272 kb)
